SVGFESpotLightElement.summary: The SVGFESpotLightElement interface corresponds to the feSpotLight element.

SVGFESpotLightElementLimitingConeAngle.summary: The limitingConeAngle read-only property of the interface reflects the {{SVGAttr("limitingConeAngle")}} attribute of the given {{SVGElement("feSpotLight")}} element.

SVGFESpotLightElementPointsAtX.summary: The pointsAtX read-only property of the interface reflects the {{SVGAttr("pointsAtX")}} attribute of the given {{SVGElement("feSpotLight")}} element.

SVGFESpotLightElementPointsAtY.summary: The pointsAtY read-only property of the interface reflects the {{SVGAttr("pointsAtY")}} attribute of the given {{SVGElement("feSpotLight")}} element.

SVGFESpotLightElementPointsAtZ.summary: The pointsAtZ read-only property of the interface reflects the {{SVGAttr("pointsAtZ")}} attribute of the given {{SVGElement("feSpotLight")}} element.

SVGFESpotLightElementSpecularExponent.summary: The specularExponent read-only property of the interface reflects the {{SVGAttr("specularExponent")}} attribute of the given {{SVGElement("feSpotLight")}} element.

SVGFESpotLightElementX.summary: The x read-only property of the interface describes the horizontal coordinate of the position of an SVG filter primitive as a .

remarks.para: It reflects the {{SVGAttr("x")}} attribute of the feSpotLight element, which can be used to define the light source in a spotlight effect. The attribute is a <number>. The default value is 0.

SVGFESpotLightElementY.summary: The y read-only property of the interface describes the vertical coordinate of the position of an SVG filter primitive as a .

remarks.para: It reflects the {{SVGAttr("y")}} attribute of the feSpotLight element, which can be used to define the light source in a spotlight effect. The attribute is a <number>. The default value is 0.

SVGFESpotLightElementZ.summary: The z read-only property of the interface describes the z-axis value of the position of an SVG filter primitive as a . A positive Z-axis comes out towards the person viewing the content.

remarks.para: It reflects the {{SVGAttr("z")}} attribute of the feSpotLight element, which can be used to define the light source in a spotlight effect. The attribute is a <number>. The default value is 0.
